original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṁ antaraghare nisīdanti bāhuṁ olambentā …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bāhuppacālakam antara ghare nisīdanti bāhum olambentā pe
na bāhuppacālakam antaraghare nisīdissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṁ antaraghare nisīdati bāhuṁ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca bāhuppacālakam antaraghare nisīdati bāhum olambentaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa
